email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. I’m quoting a freight rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider something in the high 40s, say $49.50? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $49.50 is a bit tight. How about we meet in the middle at $50.00? The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the laycan for 15-20 October? Also, please confirm the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons. Once confirmed, we can proceed with the fixture. Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! Yes, the cargo size is confirmed at 140,000 metric tons, and the laycan is locked for 15-20 October. I’ll send over the fixture recap shortly. Thanks for your cooperation. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, perfect. Looking forward to the fixture recap. Let’s keep in touch if there are any changes. Cheers, John.
